languages.text: {n}Маражай внимательно смотрит на Ирлиэт. Его выражение неуловимо меняется.{/n} "Все это время, что ты была здесь..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай внимательно смотрит на Ирлиэт. Его выражение неуловимо меняется.{/n} "Все это время, что ты была здесь..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai regarde Yrliet. Vous ne remarquez pas le moindre changement dans son expression.{/n} « Depuis que vous êtes arrivée ici... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはユリエットを見る。彼の表情にはほとんど変化が見られない。{/n}「お前、ずっとここにいたのか…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはユリエットを見る。彼の表情にはほとんど変化が見られない。{/n}「お前、ずっとここにいたのか…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋看着伊莉耶特，表情微妙的变化几乎无法察觉。{/n}“你一直都在忍受这样的感觉……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋看着伊莉耶特，表情微妙的变化几乎无法察觉。{/n}“你一直都在忍受这样的感觉……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai blickt Yrliet an. Sein Ausdruck verändert sich kaum merklich.{/n} "Die ganze Zeit, die Ihr hier wart ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt Yrliet an. Sein Ausdruck verändert sich kaum merklich.{/n} "Die ganze Zeit, die Ihr hier wart ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira a Yrliet y se produce un cambio casi imperceptible en su expresión.{/n} «Todo el tiempo que has estado aquí...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira a Yrliet y se produce un cambio casi imperceptible en su expresión.{/n} «Todo el tiempo que has estado aquí...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, Yrliet'e bakıyor. Yüz ifadesinde en ufak bir değişim olmadığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Burada geçirdiğin bunca zaman..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai looks at Yrliet. There is a barely noticeable shift in his expression.{/n} "The entire time that you have been here..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, Yrliet'e bakıyor. Yüz ifadesinde net bir değişim meydana geliyor.{/n} "Burada olduğun bunca zaman boyunca..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
